abstract: Sanofi-Aventis’s top shareholders, L’Oreal and Total, have reservations about the drug maker’s plans to buy Genzyme and are concerned that it does not overpay, bankers said.
snippet: Sanofi-Aventis’s top shareholders, L’Oreal and Total, have reservations about the drug maker’s plans to buy Genzyme and are concerned that it does not overpay, bankers said.
lead_paragraph: Sanofi-Aventis‘s top shareholders L’Oreal and Total have reservations about the drug maker’s plans to buy Genzyme and are concerned that it does not overpay, bankers told Reuters.

headline.main: Top 2 Sanofi Shareholders Seen Wary on Genzyme Bid
